short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clepsydra is a Browser Extension that helps you reflect and stay focused on what matters most.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Time is limited
===========

Base your decisions on that knowledge, aim for a more fulfilled life.

Clepsydra is a Browser Extension that helps you reflect and stay focused on what matters most. It shows the week you've been through so far and a countdown of your life expectancy.

**A simple reminder to appreciate every moment.**

Clepsydra is going to ask a few questions about your birth date and your Life Expectancy, then it'll setup itself in your New Tab page.
